languages.text: "Вы передумали, шерин? Только скажите, что томитесь жаждой, и кубок изысканного вина появится в вашей ладони".
"Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."
languages.original_text: "Вы передумали, шерин? Только скажите, что томитесь жаждой, и кубок изысканного вина появится в вашей ладони".

traits.locale_text: "Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."
"Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."
"Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."
"Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."

languages.text: “改主意了吗，亲爱的？请允许我大胆猜想，或许你也已经渴了吧？只要你发话，最美味的美酒就会递到你的手中。”
languages.original_text: "Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."

traits.locale_text: “改主意了吗，亲爱的？请允许我大胆猜想，或许你也已经渴了吧？只要你发话，最美味的美酒就会递到你的手中。”

languages.text: 「シャリーン、気が変わったかい？喉も渇いたでしょう。ひとこと言ってくれれば、最高級のワインをゴブレットに入れて手渡すよ」
languages.original_text: "Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、気が変わったかい？喉も渇いたでしょう。ひとこと言ってくれれば、最高級のワインをゴブレットに入れて手渡すよ」

languages.text: «¿Ha cambiado de opinión, shereen? Espero que también le haya entrado sed. Solo tiene que pedirlo y le traerán un cáliz del mejor vino».
languages.original_text: "Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha cambiado de opinión, shereen? Espero que también le haya entrado sed. Solo tiene que pedirlo y le traerán un cáliz del mejor vino».

languages.text: « Vous avez changé d'avis, shereen ? J'espère que tout ça vous aura donné soif. Il vous suffit d'un mot et un verre de notre meilleur vin apparaîtra dans votre main. »
languages.original_text: "Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez changé d'avis, shereen ? J'espère que tout ça vous aura donné soif. Il vous suffit d'un mot et un verre de notre meilleur vin apparaîtra dans votre main. »

languages.text: "Na, habt Ihr es Euch anders überlegt, Shereen? Ich wage zu hoffen, dass Ihr eine Menge Durst mitgebracht habt – ein Wort von Euch genügt und Ihr bekommt einen Kelch mit dem besten Wein gereicht."
languages.original_text: "Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."

traits.locale_text: "Na, habt Ihr es Euch anders überlegt, Shereen? Ich wage zu hoffen, dass Ihr eine Menge Durst mitgebracht habt – ein Wort von Euch genügt und Ihr bekommt einen Kelch mit dem besten Wein gereicht."

languages.text: "Fikrini mi değiştirdin şirinim? Büyük bir susuzluk içinde olduğunu umut etme cüreti göstereceğim. Söylemen yeterli. Şarabın en iyisiyle dolu bir kadeh, ellerinde beliriverecektir."
languages.original_text: "Changed your mind, then, shereen? I dare to hope you've worked up a mighty thirst as well — just say the word and a goblet of the finest wine will appear in your hand."

traits.locale_text: "Fikrini mi değiştirdin şirinim? Büyük bir susuzluk içinde olduğunu umut etme cüreti göstereceğim. Söylemen yeterli, şarapların en iyisiyle dolu bir kadeh ellerinde beliriverecektir."
